title: Light
data: {{version031}} {{flavour|It surrounds the wearer with a glowing halo, revealing invisible creatures, increasing accuracy against all within it other than the wearer, and reducing the wearer's stealth.}} '''Light''' is an [[ego]] found only on [[orb]]s. Like the [[unrand]] [[Eos]], characters wielding an orb of light emit a 3-tile [[halo]]. The halo makes everything inside (except you) easier to hit,When attacking a creature inside a halo, the attack's [[to-hit]] is increased by 1 + 1d8. reveals [[invisible]] creatures, and decreases stealth. ==Strategy== *The orb can be used as a bootleg [[see invisible]]. This is most useful if you don't have another [[shield]] yet. *The halo's to-hit boost not only helps you, but your [[allies]] ([[summon]]s, [[derived undead]], etc.) too. As monsters don't have the greatest accuracy, using light can really help your allies' damage output. *Remember that the halo will also impact ''your'' invisibility! Don't rely on it while wielding this orb. ==Notes== ==History== *The light ego, along with orbs themselves, was introduced in [[0.28]]. {{orb}}
